title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of lip, oral cavity and pharynx
block: Malignant neoplasms of lip, oral cavity and pharynx
category: Malignant neoplasm of other and ill-defined sites in the lip, oral cavity and pharynx
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm of lip, oral cavity and pharynx whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C00-C14.2
